flawed_nl_solution:
He feeds each horse 2*20=<<2*20=40>>40 pounds of food a day
So he uses 40*25=<<40*25=1000>>1000 pounds of food a day
That means in 60 days he uses 60*1000=<<60*1000=600000>>600000 pounds of food
Each bag of food is 2000*0.5=<<2000*0.5=1000>>1000 pounds
So he needs to buy 600000/1000=<<600000/1000=600>>600 bags of food
#### 600

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 60000, not 600000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
